CSoundWave.cpp

00001 #include "CSoundWave.h"
00002 
00003 // Sound Wave projectile, emitted by Meeps (ep3)
00004 
00005 #define SNDWAVE_SPEED         62
00006 #define SNDWAVE_SPEED_FAST    80
00007 
00008 #define SNDWAVE_ANIM_RATE     20
00009 
00010 #define SNDWAVE_LEFT_FRAME    128
00011 #define SNDWAVE_RIGHT_FRAME   126
00012 
00013 #define SNDWAVE_OFFSCREEN_KILL_TIME     100
00014 
00015 CSoundWave::CSoundWave(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00016   direction_t dir, object_t byType, size_t byID) :
00017 CRay(p_map, x, y, dir, byType, byID),
00018 animframe(0),
00019 animtimer(0),
00020 offscreentime(0)
00021 
00022 {
00023  m_type = OBJ_SNDWAVE;
00024  setupObjectType(g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode());
00025  CSprite &rSprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00026  bboxX1 = rSprite.m_bboxX1;  bboxX2 = rSprite.m_bboxX2;
00027  bboxY1 = rSprite.m_bboxY1;  bboxY2 = rSprite.m_bboxY2;
00028 
00029  performCollisions();
00030 }
00031 
00032 void CSoundWave::process()
00033 {
00034  // destroy the sound wave if it's been offscreen for a good amount
00035  // of time. this is to prevent a massive buildup of soundwaves
00036  // slowly traveling through walls all the way across the level
00037  // (which can crash the game due to running out of object slots).
00038  if (!onscreen)
00039  {
00040   if (offscreentime > SNDWAVE_OFFSCREEN_KILL_TIME)
00041   {
00042    exists = false;
00043    return;
00044   }
00045   else offscreentime++;
00046  }
00047  else offscreentime = 0;
00048 
00049  // fly through the air
00050  int x = getXPosition()>>CSF;
00051  if (m_Direction == RIGHT)
00052  {
00053   sprite = SNDWAVE_RIGHT_FRAME + animframe;
00054 
00055   if (x > static_cast<int>(mp_Map->m_width) )
00056    exists=false;
00057   else
00058   {
00059    if (mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1)
00060     moveRight(SNDWAVE_SPEED_FAST);
00061    else
00062     moveRight(SNDWAVE_SPEED);
00063   }
00064  }
00065  else
00066  {
00067   sprite = SNDWAVE_LEFT_FRAME + animframe;
00068 
00069   if (x < 2)
00070    exists = false;
00071   else
00072   {
00073    if (mp_Map->m_Difficulty>1)
00074     moveLeft(SNDWAVE_SPEED_FAST);
00075    else
00076     moveLeft(SNDWAVE_SPEED);
00077   }
00078  }
00079 
00080  // animation
00081  if (animtimer > SNDWAVE_ANIM_RATE)
00082  {
00083   animframe ^= 1;
00084   animtimer = 0;
00085  }
00086  else animtimer++;
00087 }
